item.title: 考研核心
item.description: 3.20 abound There are many forests that abound with wild animals in Northest China. v. 大量存在，富于，充满 Opportunities for misinterpretation, error, and self-deception abound. accurate adj. 精准的，准确的 breed The horse is of the best breed n.品种，类型 v.饲养，繁殖，养育，教育，

item.title: 刘晓燕
item.description: Unit2 abstract 摘要 tract 拽，抽出，提取 He made an abstract of a long articlel adj.抽象的 He is an abstract painter subtract 减去，扣除 extract v.抽出，拔出 extract his sword contract con(所有人一起) 契约，合同 attract v.吸引
